channel.title: Neighborhoods on Yet Another Geographer
channel.description: Recent content in Neighborhoods on Yet Another Geographer

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Photo Caption: It’s neat that this new algorithm is working correctly. Here, a few cluster solutions for spatially-contiguous clustering are shown in Brooklyn using some price data for some Airbnbs. I’m pretty excited about this new technique, so hopefully I’ll get it all prepped soon. I find that the hardest part for me to be motivated about is the stage right after I finish the proof of concept. It’s like… once the new stuff is done, I get much less interested than when I’m still trying to figure it out.
